content:
# REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85/-86)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
Connected via inserters and chests to store and transfer coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-27.0,-58.0)
- Transport belt system connecting components
Mining both iron and copper ore with smelting capability

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Wooden chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Burner inserters and transport belt system for ore movement
Connected via belts and inserters for ore transportation

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 5 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for input/output
- Transport belt system connecting components
Organized smelting line with input/output automation

### Power Generation System at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
Currently not operational due to incomplete fluid connections

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Remove existing entities if replacement is needed
- Example: Pipe placement failed at (-3.5,26.5) due to existing entity

### Errors when attempting to pick up non-existent entities
- Verify entity exists at target position before attempting pickup
- Double check coordinates when removing entities
- Example: Failed to pickup pipe at (-3.5,24) as it didn't exist

### Fluid connection errors
- Ensure complete pipe connections between water source, boiler and steam engine
- Connect all required fluid inputs/outputs for power generation system
- Current power system shows "no fluid present" warnings due to incomplete connections
